##  What is Kaggle?
![Kaggle Logo](https://www.kaggle.com/static/images/site-logo.png)
- Online platform for data science and machine learning competitions
- Provides datasets, notebooks, and a collaborative community


## History of Kaggle

- Founded in 2010 by Anthony Goldbloom and Ben Hamner
- Acquired by Google in 2017
- Hosts a wide range of data science competitions


## Why Use Kaggle?

- Access to diverse datasets
- Learn from top data scientists
- Improve your data science skills
- Network with professionals


## Kaggle Competitions Overview

- Competitions for various levels: Beginner to Expert
- Prize money and recognition
- Real-world problem solving



## Types of Kaggle Competitions

- Featured Competitions
- Research Competitions
- Recruitment Competitions
- Community Competitions
